Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.Client

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    UI
    UI is the interface for the user interface.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoardRepresentation
    Representation of the Board on the client side.
    CLI
    Class for the Command Line Interface.
    ClientSocketHandler
    ClientSocketHandler manages a client's connection receiving holding an input stream and an output one to receive ServerEvent and to send ClientEvent.
    ClientView
    This class is the core to manage a player during a game, observing the ServerEvent to update the client and calling the methods to send an event on the ClientSocketHandler.
    Main
    Main class to start a game client side.
    PingReceiver
    Class to verify that a user is still active.
    PlayerRepresentation
    Class to represent a player at the client side.
